title: How to Convert PSP Games to CSO or DAX

steps.headline: Open it up.
steps.description: Choose Your ISO File. Go into convert. Press Convert To CSO .

steps.headline: Press 9 Compression Rating To Have It really Compressed.

methods.name: Using PSP ISO Compresser for Windows

steps.headline: Select the type of uncompression/compression you want(eg.ISO - DAX)
Open it.
steps.description: Choose or Drag&Drop Your ISO File

steps.headline: Your compressed file is in the same directory with .cso extension.

text: Using UMDGen Download UMDGen.  Open it up. Choose Your ISO File. Go into convert. Press Convert To CSO . Press 9 Compression Rating To Have It really Compressed.  Put It Onto Your PSP.  Using PSP ISO Compresser for Windows Download the compressor.  Select the type of uncompression/compression you want(eg.ISO - DAX)  Select the Input/Outut files  Select compression rate as 9.  You are done!  Using CISO XP Download the compressor.  Open it. Choose or Drag&Drop Your ISO File Process will be started immediately  Your compressed file is in the same directory with .cso extension.  You are done!
